Texts.Eng: A music box modeled after a Poptop. A much less dangerous way to listen to its cheerful melody.
Texts.Chs: 模仿吐舌娃的音乐盒。听它欢快的旋律是一种不那么危险的方式。

Texts.Eng: I quite like music boxes... especially ones like these.
Texts.Chs: 我很喜欢音乐盒。。。尤其是像这样的。

Texts.Eng: I've heard of some strange folks farmin' Poptops for "ambiance". Guess I can see why now.
Texts.Chs: 我听说有一些奇怪的人为了“ambiance”而养Poptop。我想我现在明白为什么了。

Texts.Eng: It's a shame Poptop are so volatile... I'd imagine they'd make fine pets if domesticated.
Texts.Chs: 可惜吐舌娃如此反复无常。。。我想如果被驯养，它们会是很好的宠物。

Texts.Eng: Oh what a gentle little song...

Texts.Chs: 吐舌娃没有吐舌娃的歌！

Texts.Eng: This song is very pleasant when I don't have to worry about being gnawed on.
Texts.Chs: 当我不用担心被咬的时候，这首歌非常好听。

Texts.Eng: What a nice tune! It sounds a little familiar, actually...
Texts.Chs: 多好听的曲子啊！听起来有点熟悉，实际上。。。
